name: Jo
tagline: Jo (0.5.0) is a thin (~16K) candy shell for making HTML5 apps. Jo works with: PhoneGap, Chrome, Safari, Opera, FireFox, iOS, Android, BlackBerry 10, Tizen, & Windows Phone 8+. Features include skinnable UI widgets, a clean event model and a light data layer.
body:
# Build web apps for

|                | Chrome | Safari | FireFox | IE    | Other (Built into OS) |
|----------------|--------|--------|---------|-------|-----------------------|
| iOS 5+         | YES    | YES    | YES     |       |                       |
| Android 4.1+   | YES    |        | YES     |       | YES (per-Chrome       |
| ChromeOS       | YES    |        |         |       |                       |


- Mobile: Chrome, Safari, FireFox on iOS, Android, BlackBerry 10, Tizen, FireFox OS and Windows Phone
- Desktop: Chrome, Safari, FireFox

- PhoneGap and Cordova
- Chrome
- Safari
- FireFox


PhoneGap, Chrome, Safari, Opera, FireFox, iOS, Android, BlackBerry 10, Tizen, & Windows Phone 8+
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
